contentrichtext.text: This is the [[calendar]] for any '''[[leap year]] starting on [[Friday]]''', January 1 ([[dominical letter]] '''CB'''), such as 1932, 1960, 1988, 2016 or 2044.<ref name="herm"> "Identical Calendar Years", hermetic.ch, 2011, webpage: [http://www.hermetic.ch/cal_sw/idcal/idcal.htm Hermcal]: lists 1904, 1960, 1988, 2016, 2044, 2072, 2112, 2140, 2168, 2196. </ref> {{Year3|5|1|3}} {| class="wikitable" |- ! Millennium ! Century ! align="center" colspan="10" | Year<ref name=herm/> |- | '''[[2nd millennium|2nd Millennium]]''': | '''[[18th century]]''': | [[1768]] | [[1796]] |- | '''[[2nd millennium|2nd Millennium]]''': | '''[[19th century]]''': | [[1808]] | [[1836]] | [[1864]] | [[1892]] |- | '''[[2nd millennium|2nd Millennium]]''': | '''[[20th century]]''': | [[1904]] | [[1932]] | [[1960]] | [[1988]] |- | '''[[3rd millennium|3rd Millennium]]''': | '''[[21st century]]''': | [[2016]] | [[2044]] | [[2072]] |- | '''[[3rd millennium|3rd Millennium]]''': | '''[[22nd century]]''': | [[2112]] | [[2140]] | [[2168]] | [[2196]] |} == References == <references/> {{List of calendars}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Leap Year Starting On Friday}} [[Category:Gregorian calendar]] [[Category:Julian calendar]]
